name: Coinscape
description:
Play as a conscious Egyptian coin that values its own life and refuses to be spent! Dodge the greedy arms that want to spend you so bad and the birds that want to add you to their collection of shiny stuff while gliding high up in the sky! No one knows where are all these arms coming from , but it doesn't matter, you are a coin! Coins can't overthink!
